title: Cannot sign on to USPS.com on desktop with Firefox browser, but it works fine if I use EDGE
content: I would rather not change browsers just to use USPS.com. Can you direct me to correct settings so that I can use Firefox?
creator: raymansur43

title: website appearance needs adjusting
content: Boxes in forms on websites don't show up clearly. I cannot tell if I've checked the box or not. Also columns in graphs don't line up. I'm guessing I set up something incorrectly in Firefox browser settings, but I have no idea what.
creator: maczenith
